Cobra Kai star Xolo Mariduena joins Netflix's One Piece for Season 3 Actor Xolo Mariduena has been cast as Portgas D Ace in Netflix's live-action adaptation of 'One Piece'. The new season is set to premiere in March 2026.

Can the state protect its coconut identity?

Trump warns Zohran Mamdani over 'angry' victory speech: He's off to a bad startUS President Donald Trump warned New York Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani after calling his victory speech 'angry', saying that the Indian-origin Democrat socialist is "off to a bad start" and should be "very nice" to him.

How Mamdani has taken the Kejriwal model to New YorkZohran Mamdani's New York City mayoral win is historic, but his free bus ride pledge resembles the Kejriwal Model. AAP leader Arvind Kejriwal wooed voters with free bus rides and other freebies in 2019. Mamdani's socialist schemes, which hint at Indian-style populism, come in NYC, the heart of capitalist America.

A restaurant where you can't see your food, and that's the pointThe visual appeal of food often decides what we order at a restaurant. But have you ever heard of a dining experience where you can't see what you eat? One that's all about focus, texture, and taste, it's called dark dining.

How UP cop Rishikant Shukla misused his power to build a hundred-crore empireRishikant Shukla, Deputy Superintendent of Police, was suspended after an SIT investigation uncovered a Rs 100-crore illicit asset empire. The probe reveals deep-rooted corruption, intimidation, and collusion with a criminal syndicate in Kanpur.

sports.headline: PM Modi's Pep Talk To India's World Cup-Winning Women Cricketers This special report focuses on Prime Minister Narendra Modi's recent interaction with the Indian women's cricket team following their historic World Cup victory. The news bulletin highlighted what was described as 'a very, very interesting and a fun conversation with our champions of the women Indian cricket team that has won the World Cup.' On November 5, 2025, the Prime Minister hosted the triumphant team at his residence, lauding their resilience and remarkable comeback during the tournament. Captain Harmanpreet Kaur and Vice-captain Smriti Mandhana shared how the PM's words have been a source of motivation. The interaction also touched upon the team's journey, with the Prime Minister urging the players to promote the Fit India movement. The report also references the first phase of polling for the Bihar Assembly elections, which commenced on November 6, 2025, for 121 seats.

IND A vs SA A 2nd Unofficial Test: Squads, livestreaming details and moreIndia A and South Africa A are all set to lock horns in the second unofficial Test in Bengaluru with some big names in action. KL Rahul, Kuldeep Yadav and Temba Bavuma will be some of the stars on show during the game.

Rishabh Pant Roars Back! Named Vice-Captain for South Africa Test Series.This special report covers the BCCI's announcement of the Indian Test squad for the upcoming series against South Africa, highlighting the return of star wicketkeeper-batsman Rishabh Pant as vice-captain. According to reports, 'when Rishabh Pant got injured during the England series, it was a big blow for Indian side because you know as far as Rishabh Pant's space in the team India is concerned, always you know everybody rates him very highly'. Pant, who suffered a foot fracture during the England tour in July, has proven his fitness by leading the India A side against South Africa A. The two-match Test series is scheduled to begin on November 14 in Kolkata, with Shubman Gill captaining the 15-member squad.

No Chhetri as India reveal probables list for Asian Cup qualifier vs BangladeshIndia have decided to drop Sunil Chhetri from the probables list for the AFC Asian Cup qualifier against Bangladesh. Chhetri came back to the Indian team in March this year, reversing his retirement call from last year.

Nothing like Yograj Singh: Yuvraj dismisses comparisons to father's coaching styleYuvraj Singh says his coaching style is built on empathy and understanding, not the strict discipline he grew up with under his father, Yograj Singh. He admitted that his mentorship of Abhishek Sharma and Shubman Gill has been shaped by patience, trust and years of shared hard work.
